promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a dynamic basic chameleon dark-type holding a white hammer. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voidhammer, a dynamic basic chameleon dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Resolve, Crazy Claws. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, chameleon-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Voidhammer lurks in dark caves with its razor-sharp claws, committing unseen acts of mischief and agility.
